13.29.text: few years... but how effective are they？

In January SK Telecom， Korea′s biggest
mobile network operator， gave 2050 new customers

28.01.text:

36.70.text:
This resulted in the Korean Communications

41.46.text:

45.02.text:
The ban restricts SK Telecom from signing
up new customers.

50.83.text:
Bans and fines for illegal phone subsidies

three of the country′s major mobile phone

The saturation of the phone market has been
cited as the reason for the continued illegal

77.92.text:
There were over 57 million phone contracts
signed last year， more than the total population

83.17.text: of Korea， which is at just over 50 million.

With market growth minimal， mobile phone

91.41.text:
A new law， called the Mobile Distribution

and the number of people switching between

102.62.text:

″SK Telecom is estimated to lose around
